t: Generic Brand Amazon: Exploring the Potential with FBA

These items are typically unbranded or carry non-exclusive branding, allowing multiple sellers to offer the same product. t: Brand name listed as generic
s: It is not allowed to show, mention and sell a BRANDED product as Generic. And in deed, now it is no longer possible for other sellers to join a generic listing. If you want to list that brand make sure you have invoices (not receipts) from an AUTHORIZED distributor.

t: Can you sell generic items on Amazon? - Riverbend Consulting
s: December 18, 2024 - Generic items on Amazon are unbranded items with no recognizable name or logo. Think of them as the “no-name” goods on store shelves—functional but lacking that extra appeal from a trusted brand. Generic items typically come from manufacturers who mass-produce items and sell them in bulk ...

t: Amazon

t: Why New Sellers Should Build A Generic Brand - Sellbrite
s: June 12, 2018 - When I started out on Amazon, I had a supplier called DBL Distributors. Once I got up and running, I had over 10,000 products for sale. My brand name was generic, which helped me maintain my image of diversity.
